metadata.synopsis: When players enter a secret room where Auntie Ethel keeps her treasurers, a telepathically talking head of Nader Noroxis begs them to take Needle of Levistus out of him, which will grant him a desired death, as currently he is in great torment.

0.speaker: dbb0383a-a151-4107-ba80-eb41beba2293
0.text: MAKE IT STOP, KELEMVOR. THE PAIN. THE SCREAMING.
0.context: NodeContext: decapitated head stuck in endless pain. Begging for death. Wants it all to end.

1.speaker: dbb0383a-a151-4107-ba80-eb41beba2293
1.text: IT HURTS. KELEMVOR, WHY DOES IT HURT?
1.context: NodeContext: decapitated head stuck in endless pain. Begging for death. Wants it all to end.

2.speaker: dbb0383a-a151-4107-ba80-eb41beba2293
2.text: KELEMVOR, RELEASE ME. END THIS. I BEG OF YOU.
2.context: NodeContext: decapitated head stuck in endless pain. Begging for death. Wants it all to end.
